attributes.action: ensure prisoners serve their FULL term.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It´s about time that all prisoners serve their full sentences. They should be confined to cells for 23 hrs per day with only a bed and toilet for company. It will give them time to consider what is wrong in their lives and try to put something back into the community when released.

Make them suffer so they don´t want to re-offend.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
